query.prompt:
This text is written in Latvian. Create a word table showing the Lemma for each word. The entries in the table are Word, Lemma, Part of Speech, Gender, Case, Number, Person, Tense, Mood and Note.
* Decompose the contraction in Lemma. * Leave blank if not applicable. * Words linked by an apostrophe should be separated. * The Note should be writtern in brief, e.g. archaic. * Quotation marks should be excluded. Apostrophes in contractions are not quotation marks. * If the verb and the other word are combined, they should be separated by Lemma. In such cases, only the verb information should be written in the other columns.
1 Mūsu dzīves ceļā vidū 9 es pastāstīšu par citām lietām, ko tur ieraudzīju. 28 Kad biju nedaudz atpūtinājis savu nogurušo ķermeni, 67 Viņš man atbildēja: «Nevis cilvēks, cilvēks es kādreiz biju,
query.result: |Word|Lemma|Part of Speech|Gender|Case|Number|Person|Tense|Mood|Note| |---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---| |Mūsu|mēs|pronoun|1st person|genitive|pl.||||| |dzīves|dzīve|noun|f.|genitive|sg.||||| |ceļā|ceļš|noun|m.|locative|sg.||||| |vidū|vidus|noun|m.|locative|sg.||||| |es|es|pronoun|1st person|nominative|sg.||||| |pastāstīšu|pastāstīt|verb||||1st person|future|indicative|| |par|par|preposition|||||||| |citām|cits|pronoun|f.|dative|pl.||||| |lietām|lieta|noun|f.|dative|pl.||||| |ko|kas|pronoun||accusative|sg.||||| |tur|tur|adverb|||||||| |ieraudzīju|ieraudzīt|verb||||1st person|past|indicative|| |Kad|kad|conjunction|||||||| |biju|būt|verb||||1st person|past|indicative|| |nedaudz|nedaudz|adverb|||||||| |atpūtinājis|atpūtināt|verb||||1st person|past|indicative|| |savu|savs|pronoun||accusative|sg.||||| |nogurušo|noguris|adjective|m.|accusative|sg.||||| |ķermeni|ķermenis|noun|m.|accusative|sg.||||| |Viņš|viņš|pronoun|3rd person|nominative|sg.||||| |man|es|pronoun|1st person|dative|sg.||||| |atbildēja|atbildēt|verb||||3rd person|past|indicative|| |Nevis|nevis|conjunction|||||||| |cilvēks|cilvēks|noun|m.|nominative|sg.||||| |cilvēks|cilvēks|noun|m.|nominative|sg.||||| |es|es|pronoun|1st person|nominative|sg.||||| |kādreiz|kādreiz|adverb|||||||| |biju|būt|verb||||1st person|past|indicative||
